title: The.Simpsons.Hit.And.Run.Repack-R.G.Mechanics
description:
The.Simpsons.Hit.And.Run.Repack-R.G.Mechanics




Release Info:


Year: 2003
Genre: Arcade / Racing (Cars) / 3D / 3rd Person
Developer: Radical Entertainment
Publisher: Vivendi Universal Games
Publication Type: RePack
Game Language: Eng |Rus
Voice Language: Eng |Rus
Crack: enclosing



System Requirements:

Operating system: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7
Processor: Pentium IV 2.5 GHz
Memory: 512 MB
Video: 128 MB
Sound Card: Sound device compatible with DirectX 9.0
Free space on hard disk: 2.3 GB

Game information:

For real fans there are hidden hundreds more subtle jokes,
hinting at events especially successful series that have become
legends of the world "The Simpsons." Hanging around town
scoreboard screaming about a baseball game "Springfield
Atoms vs. Shelbyville Sharks", at the right place adorns
the statue of Lard Lad'a - fat, which supports a donut at
the stadium "just today" show Truckasaurus, dog racing in
the advertisement featured Santa's Little Helper (1989,
first season, among other things), guard Willie chasing
pigs, and Mr. Burns announces on the radio about the end
of the day: "You are free, nasty, stupid! Come back home
to their families miserable!" Among the bonuses you can
even find a Japanese detergent Mr. Sparkle with the logo
in the form of light bulbs, remarkably similar to the
image of Homer's head. We, however, have not yet been
found in the game Disco Stu, but we believe - it is there.

Game Features:

More than 56 different missions in 7
huge levels of this familiar city.
Walk around Sprinfildu - as Homer,
Bart, Apu, Marge or Lisa.
First examine the interiors Kwik-e-mart,
power plants and even the Simpsons home.
Newest story and dialogues written by writers on the show.
Voiced by real actors.
Driving with the participation of 17 different characters,
including Cletus, a guy from comics and others.
More than 40 unique vehicles.
Animated jokes and hidden jokes give the feeling of
participation in the next episode.
Hidden jokes contain specific additional material
from the "last" season of the
series and will delight true fan.

Repack Features:

The Simpsons: Hit & Run
Do not cut / recoded
